title.rendered: Women’s Zip Through Sport Jacket Long Sleeve Running Top Ladies Fitness Wear

content.rendered:
Material Composition
Sundried Eco Tech
Care Instructions
Hand Wash Only

About this item

  • The Sundried women’s sports jacket features two zip pockets to the front for storing valuables. Ideal for running, cycling, gym training, CrossFit and more.
  • The Sundried women’s sports jacket features two zip pockets to the front for storing valuables. Ideal for running, cycling, gym training, CrossFit and more.
  • This fitness top features long sleeves with thumb holes for added coverage and protection while the long length drop hem won’t ride up and will keep you covered. A full length zip body is practical and easy to put on and take off.
  • Sweat wicking technology keeps you dry while multi way stretch materials give total freedom of movement. The thick quality materials are perfect for keeping you warm when training outdoors in cold weather.
  • The classic black design of this fitness jacket is stylish and timeless and can be worn for anything, even as leisure wear. Sundried’s women’s long sleeve top is functional, practical, and stylish.
  • Sundried is a British premium ethical activewear brand and your satisfaction is our highest priority. If there are any questions or concerns about your product, please let us know and our dedicated customer services team will be happy to help.
